replies.author: Airl
replies.txt_content:
楼主你好！如果有Essentials插件请按照以下步骤操作。
[打开服务器插件文件夹的Essentials文件夹里面的config.yml]
[找到]
[修改前]
enabledSigns:
  #- color
  #- balance
  #- buy
  #- sell
  #- trade
  #- free
  #- disposal
  #- warp
  #- kit
  #- mail
  #- enchant
  #- gamemode
  #- heal
  #- info
  #- spawnmob
  #- repair
  #- time
  #- weather

[修改后]
[保存修改内容后重载插件或者重启服务器即可.]
enabledSigns:
  - color
  #- balance
  #- buy
  #- sell
  #- trade
  #- free
  #- disposal
  #- warp
  #- kit
  #- mail
  #- enchant
  #- gamemode
  #- heal
  #- info
  #- spawnmob
  #- repair
  #- time
  #- weather
